questions.stem: Which of the following Newton's laws of motion states that for every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction?
options: Third Law (Law of Action and Reaction)
questions.rationale: The Third Law of motion describes the relationship between two interacting bodies, stating that for every action there is an equal and opposite reaction.
